data.title: Horicon, WI population
data.meta_description: Population of Horicon city, Wisconsin state, Dodge County. Population density, maps, changes. Estimated population for 2024: 3,797
data.text:
Population of Horicon, WI

Last official estimated population of Horicon city (Dodge County**, Wisconsin state) was 3,695 (year 2014)[1]. This was 0.001% of total US population and 0.06% of total Wisconsin state population. Area of Horicon city is 3.4 mi² (=8.9 km²)[6], in this year population density was 1,080.41 p/mi². If population growth rate would be same as in period 2010-2014 (+0.27%/yr), Horicon city population in 2024 would be 3,797*.

• Beaver Dam city population 9.9 mi, 279°

• Mayville city 5.9 mi, 51°

• Hustisford village 7.1 mi, 168°

• Iron Ridge village 6.2 mi, 121°

• Neosho village 11.1 mi, 148°

• Clyman village 10.2 mi, 205°

• Lowell village 11.7 mi, 229°

• Kekoskee village 6.7 mi, 33°

Sources, notices

*Calculated by population.us from last known population growth rate, not official data.

**Some cities are placed on more than one county. Only 1 county is shown.

[1] Cities and Towns (Incorporated Places and Minor Civil Divisions) 2014, archived from the original, retrieved 02/23/2016

[2] City and Town Intercensal Estimates (2000-2010), archived from the original, retrieved 02/23/2016
